exercise.title: Log in to Linux and Mount Myy
exercise.p: First, open the page https://ondemand.cp.haaga-helia.fi and log in to the CentOS Linux environment.

p.i: (You can access the ondemand-system directly from Haaga-Helia campus network. If you are connecting from an external network, open first VDI desktop from http://vdi.haaga-helia.fi and from there connect the ondemand system.)

exercise.p: Double-click the icon "myy.sh" on your CentOS desktop and select "Run". Type your password into the opening window and check that the directory /mnt/myy contains now your files from the Myy-server.
Then take a screenshot of the Linux desktop and save the screenshot image to your public_html folder on the Myy server.
Finally, submit a link to the screenshot image.
